description: Field-based mapping project, associated advanced laboratory studies and preparation of thesis report. Project will involve a field component, both supervised and unsupervised. Depending on the project, this component may incur additional costs to cover travel and accommodation during field work. Students commencing course in sem 1 should enrol in ERTH6303 for sem 1 and sem 2; students commencing in sem 2 should enrol in ERTH6304 for sem 2 and the following sem 1.
